data.eml:eml: Pyura (Tunicata: Ascidiacea: Pyuridae) on the coasts of Panama

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rocha, Rosana M., Counts, Bailey Keegan (2019): Pyura (Tunicata: Ascidiacea: Pyuridae) on the coasts of Panama. Zootaxa 4564 (2): 491-513, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4564.2.9
